scripts.deploy: npm run build && near deploy --wasmFile out/main.wasm --accountId $PAWNSHOP_ID && near call $PAWNSHOP_ID new --account_id $PAWNSHOP_ID
scripts.dev-deploy: npm run build && near deploy --wasmFile out/main.wasm --accountId $PAWNSHOP_ID && near call $PAWNSHOP_ID new --account_id $PAWNSHOP_ID
